title: English-Taught Programs in South Korea
content: Yes, you can apply with English-taught programs only. Many Korean universities offer English-taught degree programs, especially at graduate level. Popular universities with English programs include: Seoul National University, Korea University, Yonsei University, KAIST, POSTECH. These programs typically require IELTS 6.0+ or TOEFL 80+ instead of TOPIK.
source_hint: Study in Korea, Korean Universities, NIIED
